Reviews.Title: “Ideal for a short break, good location and value”

Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights hotel quiet location short walk links reason value comfortable expect short citybreak holiday arrived late warm welcome overall staff helpful friendly breakfast average pride themselves providing special choice mentioned previous review bacon topped ran aversion coffee kept hot considerable time eat 100m road definitely recommend hotel planning trip berlin

Reviews.Content: hotel beautiful building located heart charlottenburg kurfürstendamm kdamm runs centre berlin hotel prime position walking distance tier garten berlin zoo kaiser church hotel peaceful street kudamm close ubahn access outer berlin stayed clean cosy lovely warm clean bathroom bought breakfast hotel day substantial buffet 12 euros berlin numerous cafes bakers supermarkets course bratwurst stalls offer value meal staff polite efficient
